channel.title: Google on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in Google on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Finding Wakelocks in Android 7 using Google’s Battery Historian
item.description: One of my favorite apps prior to my upgrade to Android 7 (Nougat) was GSam Battery Monitor (the paid version is fully worth it).

item.title: Install nodejs under ChromeOS (CR-48)
item.description: Why would I want to do this? I’m a software developer. I love javascript. I love node.js. I love the direction Google is taking web development, user interaction, and the web in general.

item.title: Running additional Google Chrome profiles in Linux
item.description: Google Chrome supports running multiple profiles. In newer versions of Google Chrome, you’ll be able to enable profiles by navigating to chrome://flags and enabling Multiple Profiles.

item.title: Linking to a Google Doc .doc as .pdf
item.description: I recently decided to update my resume, which forced me to revisit an issue I originally faced when posting my resume to my site: I am writing it as a doc file in Google Docs but I want to link to it as a PDF and have my updates visible immediately.
